name: Easy Lock
body:
### Easy Lock
Add double tap to sleep feature in your Android devices. 

Using this app, you can double tap status bar / navigation bar / lockscreen / notifications shade  to quickly lock your screen. No need to reach for the power button always!

Note: The app is fully free, without ads. If you wish to donate, you can do that via an in-app purchase. This does NOT unlock any new feature. Thank you for your support.

### Source Code
Source code will be released under Apache v2 licence soon.

### Download
[Google Play](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.sagar.easylock)

### Support or Contact
[Find me in G+](http://plus.google.com/+AravindSagar)

[Support email](mailto:aravindsuhruth+customer.care@gmail.com)
